title: Chilling Adventures of Sabrina Episode 5 "Dreams in a Witch House" Breakdown!
author: Think Story
comment:
Even though a lot of people didn't like this episode and felt it was unnecessary, It did have a lasting impact for the rest of the season for these characters.

Sabrina finds out who Wardwell is because of this; Zelda becomes more affectionate towards Hilda and doesn't kill her again; Hilda starts pushing Zelda away and becomes more independent; and Ambrose tries harder to get his house arrest lifted because of the fear his nightmare brought up.
Your videos on Sabrina and AHS are the best out there. So thorough, but no nonsense. Love that someone else pays attention to the little details! 👍
Surprised you didn’t mention the huge Cain and Abel theme in Zelda’s dream
The demon looked like a cheap power ranger villain

Hilda’s nightmare was linked to Stephen Kings The Dark Half (a book where the main character, an author, absorbed his twin in utero) and Batibat even says something about Hilda being separated from her “dark half”
description:
Get ready to cast some spells because it's my new breakdown series for "Chilling Adventures of Sabrina." This is for season one episode 5, "Dreams in a Witch House."

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/ThinkStoryYT
